items.sentence: Does Tom know we\'ve never done this before?
Please drop in at my house on your way home.
Please just leave me alone. I want to think.
Please look at the pamphlet for the details.
Please mail this letter on your way to work.
How did you know that Tom didn\'t like Mary?
My older brother goes fishing every weekend.
It looks like you\'ve already been replaced.
I wonder whether or not Tom has left Boston.
I wonder whether or not Tom still does that.
I wonder why Tom wanted me to be here today.
I wonder why Tom wants to buy that for Mary.
I can\'t answer why, but I can tell you how.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice all enjoy dancing.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice are all Canadians.
Tom, what would you like to have for dinner?
What if Tom and Mary don\'t want to do that?
Did you know that Tom has a criminal record?
Did you see the way Tom was looking at Mary?
Do you still have a key to Tom\'s apartment?
The police didn\'t find anything suspicious.
Tom had no idea that Mary hated him so much.
You shouldn\'t have eaten so much ice cream.
Did Tom ever say anything to you about that?
Did Tom ever tell you how he first met Mary?
Did Tom say anything about who was with him?
Did Tom tell you what he was planning to do?
Tom will be released from prison next month.
Tom wrote a letter to his brother in Boston.
Tom wrung the water out of his wet swimsuit.
You should\'ve waited until Monday to leave.
There\'ll be more than three hundred guests.
Tom said he didn\'t know why Mary was angry.
I demanded that he pay the bill immediately.
Congress approved the resolution in October.
The wedding was canceled at the last minute.
There are billions of stars in the universe.
Tom worked as a French teacher in Australia.
Did you see the accident with your own eyes?
Do we have an extra one that Tom can borrow?
Do you have a name picked out for your baby?
Tom made Mary an offer she couldn\'t refuse.
Tom warned Mary to stay away from his house.
Tom was a wealthy man before he got married.
Tom was able to answer all of the questions.
Tom was arrested in the middle of the night.
Would you mind telling me what\'s happening?
I\'m trying to get in touch with her sister.
I\'ve been a ski instructor for three years.
I\'ve been learning a lot about them lately.
